resources.string-array:
//Scenario 2_1 Text
So you\'re a warrior? You look strong, welcome aboard!
Thanks, Im glad to have made it
I\'ll be the brawns so you guys be the brains
I\'ll make sure to safeguard the team
You\'ll all be safe as long as Im around
//Scenario 2_2 Text
So you\'re an elementalist huh, quite a rare specimen. Welcome aboard!
It is an honor to serve the King
My magics will help us survive the dungeon
By the will of our King
Thanks, Im mastering my art thoroughly
//Scenario 2_3 Text
So you\'re an archer? Well gladly bring you on board, welcome!
I\'ll pierce them all with my bow and arrow
WIth my skills Im sure we can retrieve the staff
Pleased to be a part of the kings guard
Thanks, I hope to get along with my comrades
//Scenario 2_4 Text
That\'s neat, so you\'re an assassin? We don\'t get many of your kind around, but welcome!
I know some tricks of the trade
Glad to be a part of the crew
Its nice to meet you
Heh, pleased to make your acquaintance

//Scenario 2_1 Text
You go through the dark forest, withered leaves scattered throughout the ground, and it is getting dark. What would you do?
Walk and find a suitable shelter
Continue the journey
Camp in an open area
Go back to where you came from
//Scenario 2_2 Text
You go through the dark forest, withered leaves scattered throughout the ground, and it is getting dark. What would you do?
Walk and find a suitable shelter
Continue the journey
Camp in an open area
Go back to where you came from

You go through the dark forest, withered leaves scattered throughout the ground, and it is getting dark. What would you do?
Walk and find a suitable shelter
Continue the journey
Camp in an open area
Go back to where you came from

//Scenario 2_1 Text
It\’s daytime and you decided to continue your journey. According to the map, you only have one way to reach the necromancer\’s tower, and that is to pass the place called \“Blood Grove\” which is the home of the most ferocious monsters. As you enter the place you sense that something is watching you. You heard the hum of the banshee.
Find a place to hide
Run away
Exit the blood grove
Fight the banshee
//Scenario 2_2 Text
It\’s daytime and you decided to continue your journey. According to the map, you only have one way to reach the necromancer\’s tower, and that is to pass the place called \“Blood Grove\” which is the home of the most ferocious monsters. Fight the banshee

//Scenario 2_1 Text
You found an enchantment stone inside the cabin. After looting you decided to continue the journey. You encountered the banshee again and decided to run. The pathway that you are running at is split into two directions; left and right.
Fight the Banshee
Go Left
Go Right
Try to distract it
//Scenario 2_2 Text

//Scenario 2_1 Text
The banshee\'s screech etches you and you are paralyzed in fear and your party enters a frenzy.
Calm Down ...
Calm Down ? ? ?
Calm Down ! ! !
Calm Down @ @ @

//Scenario 2_1 Text
You walk the last paths and finally exit the Blood Grove. You arrive at the bridge that connects the Blood Grove and the Necromancer\'s Tower. The undead begin to swarm you. Prepare for combat!
Run Away
Fight the swarming undead
Give up
Sacrifice the enchantment stone
//Scenario 2_2 Text

//Scenario 2_1 Text
You make it to the mid section of the tower, you inch ever closer towards the necromancer. A minotaur emerges from the summoning circle! What do you do?
Paralyze it
Fight it
Charge towards it
Forfeit

//Scenario 2_1 Text
This is it. It\'s now or never. You will now proceed to fight the Necromancer that controls the Blood Grove and the Chaos Spiral.

//Scenario 2_1 Text
You enter the Necromancer\'s chamber. It glares at you and chuckles. It does not seem afraid of you. It provokes you, a sharp pain pierces your soul. You scream in agony. You prepare for the final showdown.
...
...
...
...
